This endpoint is identical to "POST /api/v1/vm"

parameters.description: The raw Libvirt XML definition of the VM
parameters.name: xml

parameters.description: The node the VM should be assigned to; autoselect if empty or invalid
parameters.name: node

parameters.description: The CSV list of node(s) the VM is permitted to be assigned to; should include "node" and any other valid target nodes; this limit will be used for autoselection on definition and migration
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The selector used to determine candidate nodes during migration
parameters.name: selector

parameters.description: Whether to autostart the VM when its node returns to ready domain state
parameters.name: autostart

parameters.description: The raw Libvirt XML definition of the VM
parameters.name: xml

parameters.description: Whether to automatically restart the VM to apply the new configuration
parameters.name: restart

parameters.description: The number of lines to retrieve
parameters.name: lines
